languages.text: "Что именно ты собрал{mf|ся|ась} мне объяснять, Вольный Торговец? Что проклятая мразь, изничтожавшая слуг Императора и обрекшая нас на все это, теперь входит в твою свиту?! Тогда прибереги свои объяснения, потому что для меня они будут пустой тратой времени!"

"What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"
languages.original_text: "Что именно ты собрал{mf|ся|ась} мне объяснять, Вольный Торговец? Что проклятая мразь, изничтожавшая слуг Императора и обрекшая нас на все это, теперь входит в твою свиту?! Тогда прибереги свои объяснения, потому что для меня они будут пустой тратой времени!"

"What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

languages.text: 「いったい何を説明するというのだ、自由開拓者さんよ？皇帝の従者たちを破滅させ、俺たちをこんな運命に陥れた三度呪われしクソどもが、今ではあなたの従者に加わっているということか？それなら説明を省くがいい、俺には何の意味もないんだからな！」
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「いったい何を説明するというのだ、自由開拓者さんよ？皇帝の従者たちを破滅させ、俺たちをこんな運命に陥れた三度呪われしクソどもが、今ではあなたの従者に加わっているということか？それなら説明を省くがいい、俺には何の意味もないんだからな！」

languages.text: “你到底还有什么好解释的，行商浪人？就是这个该死的异形，他杀害了帝皇的仆从，让我们落到了这种地步，可现在他居然成了你的随行人员？如果是这样，那你的解释还是省省吧，因为我根本不打算听！”
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

traits.locale_text: “你到底还有什么好解释的，行商浪人？就是这个该死的异形，他杀害了帝皇的仆从，让我们落到了这种地步，可现在他居然成了你的随行人员？如果是这样，那你的解释还是省省吧，因为我根本不打算听！”

languages.text: «¿Qué pretende explicarme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Que la alimaña tres veces maldita que destruyó a los siervos del Emperador y nos condenó a este destino se ha unido ahora a su séquito? ¡Entonces ahórrese sus explicaciones, porque no me servirán de nada!».
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué pretende explicarme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Que la alimaña tres veces maldita que destruyó a los siervos del Emperador y nos condenó a este destino se ha unido ahora a su séquito? ¡Entonces ahórrese sus explicaciones, porque no me servirán de nada!».

languages.text: "Was genau gedenkt Ihr mir zu erklären, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Dass der dreimal verfluchte Abschaum, der die Diener des Imperators ausgelöscht und uns zu diesem Schicksal verdammt hat, jetzt wieder Teil Eures Gefolges ist? Dann spart Euch Eure Erklärungen, denn sie machen für mich keinen Unterschied!"
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Was genau gedenkt Ihr mir zu erklären, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Dass der dreimal verfluchte Abschaum, der die Diener des Imperators ausgelöscht und uns zu diesem Schicksal verdammt hat, jetzt wieder Teil Eures Gefolges ist? Dann spart Euch Eure Erklärungen, denn sie machen für mich keinen Unterschied!"

languages.text: « Et que comptez-vous m'expliquer exactement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Qu'un de ces maudits parasites qui prennent plaisir à massacrer les serviteurs de l'Empereur et qui nous ont réduits à cet état fait désormais partie de votre entourage ? Dans ce cas, inutile de gaspiller votre salive, vos explications ne changeront rien ! »
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Et que comptez-vous m'expliquer exactement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Qu'un de ces maudits parasites qui prennent plaisir à massacrer les serviteurs de l'Empereur et qui nous ont réduits à cet état fait désormais partie de votre entourage ? Dans ce cas, inutile de gaspiller votre salive, vos explications ne changeront rien ! »

languages.text: "Acaba tam olarak ne açıklama niyetindesin Hür Tacir? İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının canını alıp bizi bu kadere mahkûm eden, bin kere lanet okuduğum şu leşin artık maiyetine katıldığını mı? O hâlde boşuna nefesini tüketme; bana sökmez!"
languages.original_text: "What exactly do you intend to explain to me, Rogue Trader? That the thrice-cursed filth that destroyed the Emperor's servants and consigned us to this fate has now joined your retinue? Then save your explanations, because they will make no difference to me!"
